Mootral bụ ụlọ ọrụ nké Britain na Switzerland nke na-emepụta ihe mgbakwunye nri iji belata ikuku methane sitere na anụmanụ na-eri nri, ọkachasị ehi na atụrụ, kamakwa ewu. Methane bụ nnukwu gas na-ekpo ọkụ ma na akụkọ nké anọ nkè Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC) na-atụ aro ka ọ mụbaa site na x23 ruo x72 multiplier n'ihi oke mmetụta ya na carbon dioxide na obere ogologo ndụ na ikuku ụwa.
Ọ bụ Neem Biotech na-emepụta ihe mgbakwunye nri sitere n'okike Mootral
Ihe na-arụ ọrụ bụ ihe organosulfur compound (nke a na-ahụkarị na galik), Nnyocha na Mahadum Aberystwyth, Wales egosila mbelata ruru pasentị iri itoolu na anọ na mmepụta methane.

Ụlọ ọrụ ndị na-eji mgbakwunye nri Mootral na-emepụta ego carbon nkè enwere ike iji mee ka ha belata ọkwa ha ma ọ bụ ree ndị ọzọ. N'ọnwa Disemba afọ 2019, Verra kwupụtara na ọ kwadoro Mootral dị ka usoro mbụ n'ụwa iji belata ikuku methane sitere na anụ ụlọ na-eri anụ.
Mootral dọtara uche dị ukwuu dị ka ónyé nkè abụọ na FT Global Climate Challenge na Dutch Postcode Lottery
Mootral bụ ónyé ikpeazụ na Shell / BBC / Newsweek World Challenge 2009 dị ka otu n'ime ihe ngwọta iri na abuo kachasị mma màkà mgbanwe ihu igwe.
Chris Sacca na Tribe Capital na-akwado Mootral.
